title: 📈 RVS + GC/DC 3H 通用版 v5.0
pine:
//@version=5
strategy("📈 RVS + GC/DC 3H 通用版 v5.0",
         overlay=true,
         default_qty_type=strategy.percent_of_equity,
         default_qty_value=100)

// === 參數：開關 ==============================================
enableBacktest = input.bool(true, "✅ 啟用回測策略 (關閉只顯示指標)")

// === EMA =====================================================
ema10 = ta.ema(close, 10)
ema20 = ta.ema(close, 20)
plot(ema10, color=color.blue , title="EMA10", linewidth=2)
plot(ema20, color=color.red  , title="EMA20", linewidth=2)

// === MACD 6-26-9 =============================================
fastLen   = input.int(6 , "MACD Fast",   minval=1)
slowLen   = input.int(26, "MACD Slow",   minval=1)
signalLen = input.int(9 , "MACD Signal", minval=1)
[macdLine, signalLine, _] = ta.macd(close, fastLen, slowLen, signalLen)

goldenCross = ta.crossover(macdLine, signalLine)
deathCross  = ta.crossunder(macdLine, signalLine)

// === K 棒資訊 / RVS 判定 =====================================
bodyHigh = math.max(open, close)
bodyLow  = math.min(open, close)
bodyPct  = math.abs(close - open) / open
isGreen  = close > open
isRed    = close < open

ema10Touch = ema10 >= bodyLow and ema10 <= bodyHigh
ema20Touch = ema20 >= bodyLow and ema20 <= bodyHigh
touchBoth  = ema10Touch and ema20Touch

rvsGreen       = isGreen and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
rvsRed         = isRed   and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
strongRvsGreen = rvsGreen and bodyPct >= 0.045
strongRvsRed   = rvsRed   and bodyPct >= 0.045

// === 撐住 🛡️ =================================================
var float lastRvsLow = na
var int   lastRvsBar = na
if strongRvsGreen or strongRvsRed
    lastRvsLow := low
    lastRvsBar := bar_index

isHold = not na(lastRvsLow) and
         bar_index - lastRvsBar > 0 and bar_index - lastRvsBar <= 5 and
         isGreen and low <= lastRvsLow and
         (close >= ema10 or close >= ema20)

// === 外部三角形 ==============================================
isFullyAbove = low  > ema10 and low  > ema20
isFullyBelow = high < ema10 and high < ema20

// === 最近兩根是否出現 RVS（含★）==============================
recentLongRvs  = rvsGreen[1] or rvsGreen[2] or strongRvsGreen[1] or strongRvsGreen[2]
recentShortRvs = rvsRed  [1] or rvsRed  [2] or strongRvsRed  [1] or strongRvsRed  [2]

// === 本根有無觸碰 EMA10/20 ===================================
bodyTouchEma = ema10Touch or ema20Touch

// === RVS 反轉（避免連續） ====================================
var int lastRevBar = na
rawLongRev  = recentLongRvs  and bodyTouchEma and isRed
rawShortRev = recentShortRvs and bodyTouchEma and isGreen
longRev  = rawLongRev  and (na(lastRevBar) or bar_index - lastRevBar > 1)
shortRev = rawShortRev and (na(lastRevBar) or bar_index - lastRevBar > 1)
if longRev or shortRev
    lastRevBar := bar_index

// === RVS 回條可加碼（同向 & 不與反轉同根）====================
longAdd  = (not longRev)  and recentLongRvs  and bodyTouchEma and (rvsGreen or strongRvsGreen)
shortAdd = (not shortRev) and recentShortRvs and bodyTouchEma and (rvsRed   or strongRvsRed)

// =================================================================
// === ▓▓▓ 交易邏輯 ▓▓▓ ============================================
// =================================================================
if enableBacktest
    // ───── 進場 / 加碼 ─────
    if (rvsGreen or goldenCross or longAdd) and strategy.position_size >= 0
        strategy.entry(id="Long",  direction=strategy.long)
    if (rvsRed   or deathCross  or shortAdd) and strategy.position_size <= 0
        strategy.entry(id="Short", direction=strategy.short)

    // ───── 出場 ─────
    if strategy.position_size > 0 and (rvsRed or deathCross or longRev)
        strategy.close("Long",  comment="Exit 多")
    if strategy.position_size < 0 and (rvsGreen or goldenCross or shortRev)
        strategy.close("Short", comment="Exit 空")

// =================================================================
// === 視覺化標記（與指標版一致）==================================
plotshape(goldenCross , title="GC", style=shape.triangleup  , location=location.belowbar, color=color.lime , size=size.small, text="GC做多", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(deathCross  , title="DC", style=shape.triangledown, location=location.abovebar, color=color.red  , size=size.small, text="DC做空", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, title="RVS 多頭", style=shape.labelup , location=location.belowbar, color=color.fuchsia, size=size.tiny, text="RVS 做多", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed  , title="RVS 空頭", style=shape.labeldown, location=location.abovebar, color=color.fuchsia, size=size.tiny, text="RVS 做空", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(strongRvsGreen, title="RVS-★ 多頭", style=shape.labelup , location=location.belowbar, color=#FFD700, size=size.tiny, text="RVS-★ 做多", textcolor=color.black)
plotshape(strongRvsRed  , title="RVS-★ 空頭", style=shape.labeldown, location=location.abovebar, color=#FFD700, size=size.tiny, text="RVS-★ 做空", textcolor=color.black)

plotshape(isHold, title="撐住 🛡️", style=shape.labelup, location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.teal, text="🛡️撐住", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(isFullyAbove, title="外部多頭", style=shape.triangleup, location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.lime)
plotshape(isFullyBelow, title="外部空頭", style=shape.triangledown, location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.orange)

plotshape(longRev ,  title="RVS-多單反轉", style=shape.labeldown, location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=color.orange, text="RVS-多單反轉", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(shortRev,  title="RVS-空單反轉", style=shape.labelup  , location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.orange, text="RVS-空單反轉", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(longAdd ,  title="RVS 回條加碼 Long",  style=shape.arrowup , location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.green, text="RVS回條\n加碼", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(shortAdd,  title="RVS 回條加碼 Short", style=shape.arrowdown, location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.red  , text="RVS回條\n加碼", textcolor=color.white)

// === 固定右上角說明 ==========================================
infoText = "🟢▲ 外部多頭：整根高於 EMA10/20\n" +
           "🟠▼ 外部空頭：整根低於 EMA10/20\n" +
           "🟪 RVS：包住 EMA10/20，實體 ≥ 2%\n" +
           "⭐ RVS-★：實體 ≥ 4.5%，超強反轉\n" +
           "🛡️ 撐住：低於 RVS-★ 但站回均線\n" +
           "🟩 6.26.9 GC：MACD 金叉\n" +
           "🟥 6.26.9 DC：MACD 死叉\n" +
           "⚠️ RVS 反轉：近 2 根出現 RVS 後本根顏色反向且碰 EMA\n" +
           "🔄 RVS 回條：近 2 根同向 RVS 後本根再碰 EMA 可加碼\n" +
           "⚙️ 回測開關：" + (enableBacktest ? "ON" : "OFF")

rightShift = 11
topY = ta.highest(high, 5) * 1.04
var label infoLabel = na
if na(infoLabel)
    infoLabel := label.new(bar_index + rightShift, topY, infoText,
               xloc=xloc.bar_index, yloc=yloc.price,
               style=label.style_label_left, size=size.small,
               color=color.new(#000000, 100), textcolor=color.white)
else
    label.set_xy(infoLabel, bar_index + rightShift, topY),
    label.set_text(infoLabel, infoText)

// === 快訊 ====================================================
alertcondition(goldenCross , title="❇️ GC 做多", message="GC 做多訊號觸發！")
alertcondition(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, title="💜 RVS 做多", message="RVS 做多訊號觸發！")
alertcondition(longRev,  title="⛔ RVS 多單反轉",  message="RVS 多單反轉警示，請留意平倉！")
alertcondition(longAdd,  title="🔄 RVS 回條加碼 Long",  message="RVS 回條滿足，加碼多單！")

alertcondition(deathCross , title="🔻 DC 做空", message="DC 做空訊號觸發！")
alertcondition(rvsRed and not strongRvsRed , title="💜 RVS 做空", message="RVS 做空訊號觸發！")
alertcondition(shortRev, title="⛔ RVS 空單反轉", message="RVS 空單反轉警示，請留意平倉！")
alertcondition(shortAdd, title="🔄 RVS 回條加碼 Short", message="RVS 回條滿足，加碼空單！")

title: RD現貨-無策略+鬧鐘版本（含 RVS 反轉 & 回條加碼）群組升級款可考慮這款，有加碼提示
summary: RD 4T現貨-無策略+鬧鐘版本（含 RVS 反轉 & 回條加碼
pine:
//@version=5
indicator("📌 RD現貨-無策略+鬧鐘版本（含 RVS 反轉 & 回條加碼）", overlay=true)

// === EMA =====================================================
ema10 = ta.ema(close, 10)
ema20 = ta.ema(close, 20)
plot(ema10, color=color.blue , linewidth=2)
plot(ema20, color=color.red  , linewidth=2)

// === MACD 6-26-9 =============================================
fastLen   = input.int(6 , "MACD Fast Length"  , minval=1)
slowLen   = input.int(26, "MACD Slow Length"  , minval=1)
signalLen = input.int(9 , "MACD Signal Length", minval=1)
[macdLine, signalLine, _] = ta.macd(close, fastLen, slowLen, signalLen)

goldenCross = ta.crossover(macdLine, signalLine)
deathCross  = ta.crossunder(macdLine, signalLine)

plotshape(goldenCross, title="MACD 金叉", style=shape.triangleup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.lime,
          text="GC", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(deathCross , title="MACD 死叉", style=shape.triangledown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.red,
          text="DC", textcolor=color.white)

// === K 棒 / RVS ==============================================
bodyHigh = math.max(open, close)
bodyLow  = math.min(open, close)
bodyPct  = math.abs(close - open) / open
isGreen  = close > open
isRed    = close < open

ema10InBody = ema10 >= bodyLow and ema10 <= bodyHigh
ema20InBody = ema20 >= bodyLow and ema20 <= bodyHigh
touchBoth   = ema10InBody and ema20InBody

rvsGreen       =  isGreen and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
rvsRed         =  isRed   and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
strongRvsGreen = rvsGreen and bodyPct >= 0.045
strongRvsRed   = rvsRed   and bodyPct >= 0.045

// === 🛡️ 撐住邏輯 ============================================
var float lastRvsLow = na
var int   lastRvsBar = na
if strongRvsGreen or strongRvsRed
    lastRvsLow := low
    lastRvsBar := bar_index

isHold = not na(lastRvsLow) and
         bar_index - lastRvsBar > 0 and bar_index - lastRvsBar <= 5 and
         isGreen and low <= lastRvsLow and
         (close >= ema10 or close >= ema20)

// === 外部三角形 ==============================================
plotshape(low  > ema10 and low  > ema20, title="外部多頭", style=shape.triangleup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.lime)
plotshape(high < ema10 and high < ema20, title="外部空頭", style=shape.triangledown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.orange)

// === RVS / RVS-★ 標記 ========================================
plotshape(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, title="RVS 多頭", style=shape.labelup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.fuchsia,
          text="RVS", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed  , title="RVS 空頭", style=shape.labeldown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=color.fuchsia,
          text="RVS", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(strongRvsGreen, title="RVS-★ 多頭", style=shape.labelup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=#FFD700,
          text="RVS-★", textcolor=color.black)
plotshape(strongRvsRed  , title="RVS-★ 空頭", style=shape.labeldown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=#FFD700,
          text="RVS-★", textcolor=color.black)

plotshape(isHold, title="撐住 🛡️", style=shape.labelup, location=location.belowbar,
          size=size.tiny, color=color.teal, text="🛡️撐住了", textcolor=color.white)

// === 近 2 根是否有 RVS（含 RVS-★）============================
recentLongRvs  = rvsGreen[1] or rvsGreen[2] or strongRvsGreen[1] or strongRvsGreen[2]
recentShortRvs = rvsRed  [1] or rvsRed  [2] or strongRvsRed  [1] or strongRvsRed  [2]

// 本根實體是否碰到 EMA10 / 20
bodyTouchEma = (ema10 <= bodyHigh and ema10 >= bodyLow) or
               (ema20 <= bodyHigh and ema20 >= bodyLow)

// === ⚠️ RVS 反轉（避免連續顯示）==============================
var int lastRevBar = na  // 記錄最後一次畫反轉標籤的 bar_index

rawLongRev  = recentLongRvs  and bodyTouchEma and isRed
rawShortRev = recentShortRvs and bodyTouchEma and isGreen

longRev  = rawLongRev  and (na(lastRevBar) or bar_index - lastRevBar > 1)
shortRev = rawShortRev and (na(lastRevBar) or bar_index - lastRevBar > 1)

// 若畫標籤 → 更新 lastRevBar
if longRev or shortRev
    lastRevBar := bar_index

plotshape(longRev,  title="RVS-多單反轉", style=shape.labeldown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=color.orange,
          text="RVS-多單反轉-可加倉", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(shortRev, title="RVS-空單反轉", style=shape.labelup,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.orange,
          text="RVS-空單反轉-可加倉", textcolor=color.white)

// === 🔄 RVS 回條可加碼（同向 & 碰 EMA；若已反轉則不畫）=======
rvsLongRetraceAdd  = (not longRev)  and recentLongRvs  and bodyTouchEma and (rvsGreen or strongRvsGreen)
rvsShortRetraceAdd = (not shortRev) and recentShortRvs and bodyTouchEma and (rvsRed   or strongRvsRed)

plotshape(rvsLongRetraceAdd,  title="RVS 回條加碼 Long",  style=shape.arrowup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.green,
          text="RVS回條\n可加碼", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(rvsShortRetraceAdd, title="RVS 回條加碼 Short", style=shape.arrowdown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.red,
          text="RVS回條\n可加碼", textcolor=color.white)

// === 固定右上角說明 ==========================================
infoText =
     "🟢▲ 外部多頭：整根高於 EMA10/20\n" +
     "🟠▼ 外部空頭：整根低於 EMA10/20\n" +
     "🟪 RVS：包住 EMA10/20，實體 ≥ 2%\n" +
     "⭐ RVS-★：實體 ≥ 4.5%\n" +
     "🛡️ 撐住：低於 RVS-★ 但站回均線\n" +
     "🟩 6.26.9 GC：MACD 金叉\n" +
     "🟥 6.26.9 DC：MACD 死叉\n" +
     "⚠️ RVS 後 2 根若碰均線且顏色反向 → 反轉警示（不連續顯示）\n" +
     "🔄 RVS 後 2 根若同向且碰均線 → 回條可加碼-位置請看回歷史支撐阻力設置點位"

rightShift = 11
topY = ta.highest(high, 5) * 1.04
var label infoLabel = na
if na(infoLabel)
    infoLabel := label.new(bar_index + rightShift, topY, infoText,
               xloc=xloc.bar_index, yloc=yloc.price,
               style=label.style_label_left, size=size.small,
               color=color.new(#000000, 100), textcolor=color.white)
else
    label.set_xy   (infoLabel, bar_index + rightShift, topY),
    label.set_text (infoLabel, infoText)

// === 出場條件 ================================================
exitLong  = deathCross or rvsRed
exitShort = goldenCross or rvsGreen

// === 組合快訊（含反轉 / 回條加碼）============================
longGroupAlert  = goldenCross or (rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen) or exitShort or longRev  or rvsLongRetraceAdd
shortGroupAlert = deathCross  or (rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed)   or exitLong  or shortRev or rvsShortRetraceAdd

alertcondition(longGroupAlert , title="📈 多方訊號觸發（含反轉/回條加碼）",
               message="📈 多方訊號：GC / RVS 做多 / 平空 / 反轉警示 / RVS 回條可加碼")
alertcondition(shortGroupAlert, title="📉 空方訊號觸發（含反轉/回條加碼）",
               message="📉 空方訊號：DC / RVS 做空 / 平多 / 反轉警示 / RVS 回條可加碼")

               xloc=xloc.bar_index, yloc=yloc.price,
               style=label.style_label_left, size=size.small,
               color=color.new(#000000, 100), textcolor=color.white)
else
    label.set_xy(infoLabel, bar_index + rightShift, topY),
    label.set_text(infoLabel, infoText)

// ============================================================
// === ✅ 多單／空單「加碼」條件（與策略 Long/Short 同步） =====
// ============================================================
// ‼️ 使用 [1] → 前一根 K 棒滿足條件 → 圖示畫在本根 = 策略實際進場根
longAdd  = ta.crossover(macdLine[1], signalLine[1]) or (rvsGreen[1] and not strongRvsGreen[1])
shortAdd = ta.crossunder(macdLine[1], signalLine[1]) or (rvsRed[1]   and not strongRvsRed[1])

// --- 畫加碼提示 ----------------------------------------------
plotshape(longAdd,  title="📈 加碼 Long",  style=shape.arrowup  ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.small,
          color=color.green, text="加碼", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(shortAdd, title="📉 加碼 Short", style=shape.arrowdown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.small,
          color=color.red  , text="加碼", textcolor=color.white)

// === 快訊條件：出場（保持原邏輯） ============================
exitLong  = deathCross or rvsRed
exitShort = goldenCross or rvsGreen

// === 組合快訊條件（加入加碼） ================================
longGroupAlert  = longAdd  or goldenCross or (rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen) or exitShort
shortGroupAlert = shortAdd or deathCross  or (rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed)   or exitLong

alertcondition(longGroupAlert , title="📈 多方訊號觸發（含加碼）", message="多方訊號：GC / RVS 做多 或 多單加碼 / 平空")
alertcondition(shortGroupAlert, title="📉 空方訊號觸發（含加碼）", message="空方訊號：DC / RVS 做空 或 空單加碼 / 平多")

title: 📈 RVS + GC/DC 4H 通用版 v4.0 群組款用這個
pine:
//@version=5
strategy("📈 RVS + GC/DC 4H 通用版 v4.0", overlay=true,
     default_qty_type=strategy.percent_of_equity, default_qty_value=100)

// === 開關：啟用回測策略 ===
enableBacktest = input.bool(true, "✅ 啟用回測策略 (關閉只顯示指標)")

// === EMA
ema10 = ta.ema(close, 10)
ema20 = ta.ema(close, 20)
plot(ema10, color=color.blue , title="EMA10", linewidth=2)
plot(ema20, color=color.red  , title="EMA20", linewidth=2)

// === MACD 6‑26‑9
fastLen   = input.int(6 , "MACD Fast",   minval=1)
slowLen   = input.int(26, "MACD Slow",   minval=1)
signalLen = input.int(9 , "MACD Signal", minval=1)
[macdLine, signalLine, _] = ta.macd(close, fastLen, slowLen, signalLen)

goldenCross = ta.crossover(macdLine, signalLine)
deathCross  = ta.crossunder(macdLine, signalLine)

// === K 棒實體資訊
bodyHigh = math.max(open, close)
bodyLow  = math.min(open, close)
bodySize = math.abs(close - open)
bodyPct  = bodySize / open
isGreen  = close > open
isRed    = close < open

// === 是否包住 EMA10 / 20
ema10InBody = ema10 >= bodyLow and ema10 <= bodyHigh
ema20InBody = ema20 >= bodyLow and ema20 <= bodyHigh
touchBoth   = ema10InBody and ema20InBody

// === RVS & RVS‑★
rvsGreen        = isGreen and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
rvsRed          = isRed   and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
strongRvsGreen  = rvsGreen and bodyPct >= 0.045
strongRvsRed    = rvsRed   and bodyPct >= 0.045
isStrongRVS     = strongRvsGreen or strongRvsRed

// === 🛡️ 撐住邏輯
var float lastRvsLow = na
var int   lastRvsBar = na
if isStrongRVS
    lastRvsLow := low
    lastRvsBar := bar_index
lookback = 5
barsSinceLastRvs = bar_index - lastRvsBar
isHold = not na(lastRvsLow) and barsSinceLastRvs > 0 and barsSinceLastRvs <= lookback and isGreen and low <= lastRvsLow and (close >= ema10 or close >= ema20)

// === 外部三角形
isFullyAbove = low  > ema10 and low  > ema20
isFullyBelow = high < ema10 and high < ema20

// === 進出場策略 ===
if enableBacktest and strategy.position_size == 0
    if rvsGreen or goldenCross
        strategy.entry("Long", strategy.long)
    if rvsRed or deathCross
        strategy.entry("Short", strategy.short)

if enableBacktest and strategy.position_size > 0 and (rvsRed or deathCross)
    strategy.close("Long", comment="Exit 多")
if enableBacktest and strategy.position_size < 0 and (rvsGreen or goldenCross)
    strategy.close("Short", comment="Exit 空")

// === 模擬 Exit 標籤
showExitLong  = strategy.position_size[1] > 0 and (rvsRed or deathCross)
showExitShort = strategy.position_size[1] < 0 and (rvsGreen or goldenCross)
exitYOffset = (high - low) * 1.5

if showExitLong
    label.new(bar_index, high + exitYOffset, "⛔平多", yloc=yloc.price, style=label.style_label_down,
              color=color.red, textcolor=color.white, size=size.small)
if showExitShort
    label.new(bar_index, low - exitYOffset, "⛔平空", yloc=yloc.price, style=label.style_label_up,
              color=color.lime, textcolor=color.black, size=size.small)

// === 視覺標記
plotshape(goldenCross , title="GC", style=shape.triangleup   , location=location.belowbar, color=color.lime , size=size.small, text="GC做多",textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(deathCross  , title="DC", style=shape.triangledown , location=location.abovebar, color=color.red  , size=size.small, text="DC做空",textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, title="RVS 多頭", style=shape.labelup , location=location.belowbar, color=color.fuchsia, size=size.tiny, text="RVS 做多", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(rvsRed and not strongRvsRed ,   title="RVS 空頭", style=shape.labeldown, location=location.abovebar, color=color.fuchsia, size=size.tiny, text="RVS 做空", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(strongRvsGreen, title="RVS-★ 多頭", style=shape.labelup , location=location.belowbar, color=#FFD700, size=size.tiny, text="RVS‑★ 做多", textcolor=color.black)
plotshape(strongRvsRed , title="RVS-★ 空頭", style=shape.labeldown, location=location.abovebar, color=#FFD700, size=size.tiny, text="RVS‑★ 做空", textcolor=color.black)
plotshape(isHold, title="撐住 🛡️", style=shape.labelup, location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.teal, text="🛡️撐住", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(isFullyAbove, title="外部多頭", style=shape.triangleup, location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.lime)
plotshape(isFullyBelow, title="外部空頭", style=shape.triangledown, location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.orange)

// === 固定右上角說明
infoText = "🟢▲ 外部多頭：整根高於 EMA10/20\n" +
           "🟠▼ 外部空頭：整根低於 EMA10/20\n" +
           "🟪 RVS：包住 EMA10/20，實體 ≥ 2%\n" +
           "⭐ RVS-★：實體 ≥ 4.5%，超強反轉\n" +
           "🛡️ 撐住：低於 RVS-★ 但站回均線\n" +
           "🟩 6.26.9 GC：MACD 金叉，短線轉強\n" +
           "🟥 6.26.9 DC：MACD 死叉，短線轉弱\n" +
           "⚙️ 回測開關：" + (enableBacktest ? "ON" : "OFF")

rightShift = 11
topY = ta.highest(high, 5) * 1.04
var label infoLabel = na
if na(infoLabel)
    infoLabel := label.new(bar_index + rightShift, topY, infoText, xloc=xloc.bar_index, yloc=yloc.price, style=label.style_label_left, size=size.small, color=color.new(#000000, 100), textcolor=color.white)
else
    label.set_xy(infoLabel, bar_index + rightShift, topY)
    label.set_text(infoLabel, infoText)

// === 快訊條件 ==========================
alertcondition(goldenCross , title = "❇️ GC 做多", message = "GC 做多訊號觸發！")
alertcondition(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, title = "💜 RVS 做多", message = "RVS 做多訊號觸發！")
alertcondition(showExitLong , title = "⛔ 平多", message = "平多出場訊號觸發！")

alertcondition(deathCross , title = "🔻 DC 做空", message = "DC 做空訊號觸發！")
alertcondition(rvsRed and not strongRvsRed , title = "💜 RVS 做空", message = "RVS 做空訊號觸發！")
alertcondition(showExitShort, title = "⛔ 平空", message = "平空出場訊號觸發！")

title: MACD 6.26.9 紅綠點設計 群組款用這個
summary: 改良版的 MACD 指標（移動平均收斂背離指標），不只畫出傳統的 MACD 線與 Signal 線，還 額外在金叉與死叉的位置標記綠色與紅色圓點，協助用戶視覺上快速辨識多空訊號。
pine:
//@version=6
indicator(title="MACD 6.26.9 紅綠點設計", shorttitle="MACD", overlay=false)

// === 參數 ===
fast_length   = input.int(title="Fast Length",   defval=12, minval=1, maxval=50)
slow_length   = input.int(title="Slow Length",   defval=26, minval=1, maxval=100)
signal_length = input.int(title="Signal Smoothing", defval=9,  minval=1, maxval=50)

sma_source = input.string(title="MACD MA Type",  defval="EMA", options=["SMA", "EMA"])
sma_signal = input.string(title="Signal MA Type", defval="EMA", options=["SMA", "EMA"])

src = input.source(title="Source", defval=close)

// === 樣式 ===
macdColor    = input.color(title="MACD 線顏色",   defval=color.blue)
signalColor  = input.color(title="Signal 線顏色", defval=color.orange)
macdWidth    = input.int(title="MACD 線寬",       defval=1, minval=1, maxval=5)
signalWidth  = input.int(title="Signal 線寬",     defval=1, minval=1, maxval=5)

// === 計算 ===
fast_ma = sma_source == "SMA" ? ta.sma(src, fast_length) : ta.ema(src, fast_length)
slow_ma = sma_source == "SMA" ? ta.sma(src, slow_length) : ta.ema(src, slow_length)
macd    = fast_ma - slow_ma
signal  = sma_signal == "SMA" ? ta.sma(macd, signal_length) : ta.ema(macd, signal_length)

// === 圖形 ===
hline(0, "Zero Line", color=color.new(color.gray, 60))
plot(macd,   title="MACD Line",   color=macdColor,   linewidth=macdWidth)
plot(signal, title="Signal Line", color=signalColor, linewidth=signalWidth)

// === 金叉 / 死叉 標記 ===
goldenCross = ta.crossover(macd, signal)   // 快線上穿 → 金叉
deathCross  = ta.crossunder(macd, signal)  // 快線下穿 → 死叉

plot(goldenCross ? macd : na, title="Golden Cross Point", style=plot.style_circles, color=color.lime, linewidth=3)
plot(deathCross  ? macd : na, title="Death Cross Point",  style=plot.style_circles, color=color.red,  linewidth=3)
